data.name: Gordian Rooms 2: A curious island
data.detailed_description:
PLAY THE PREQUEL!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1285080


About the Game



Shortly after the events of the first game you, somehow, set sail to a mysterious island in order to become a full fledged member of the Gordian Society! Will you become one of the chosen few?


Various beautiful locations and mind bending mysteries await you on the Isle of Lye, one of the many testing locations of the Gordian Society.
To successfully escape from the island you will need to venture through mazes, gardens and eventually, through the very Mansion of Lye.


As you overcome various obstacles you will also have the chance to learn about the prestigious family of Lye. Discovering these secrets is only possible for those who have the best of wits!
data.about_the_game:
Shortly after the events of the first game you, somehow, set sail to a mysterious island in order to become a full fledged member of the Gordian Society! Will you become one of the chosen few?

data.short_description: Your adventure continues in Gordian Rooms 2... The escape island game where you venture further into the mysteries of the Gordian Society! Challenge your wits and conquer every puzzle on the Isle of Lye!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i3 series, 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics Card with 4GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 series or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
